discover.title: We bring transparency into the opaque landscape of online antiques
discover.p1: Aura Historia searches through the vast offerings of thousands of scattered antique dealers, auction houses and marketplaces worldwide and bundles their items in one central place.
discover.p2: We not only capture current and upcoming items but also track price changes and availability. This way, you never miss a bargain and always keep an eye on the market.

highlight1.title: Over 500 Dealers, Auction Houses & Marketplaces
highlight1.description: We continuously search renowned antique dealers, auction houses and marketplaces from all over Europe and beyond.

highlight2.title: Near Real-Time Monitoring
highlight2.description: Newly offered antiques as well as price- or availability-changes are automatically captured in near real-time.

highlight3.title: Fully Language-agnostic
highlight3.description: We translate every antique into multiple languages. The language in which you search does not matter. We currently support English, German, French and Spanish.

landingPage.titleSecondLine: One central place to find the antiques you're looking for

features.title: Antiques are scattered everywhere online - your search shouldn't be
features.subtitle: Aura Historia ist the most sophisticated search-engine for antiques and provides you with all the tools to efficiently search the antiques market.

search.title: Intelligent Search
search.description: Search hundreds of thousands of items with our powerful search engine. Cut out all the noise by filtering for condition, price, dealer, and much more.

global.title: Worldwide Coverage
global.description: We connect you with renowned antique dealers from over 15 countries – from Germany to the USA. No matter how small the dealer, if he has an online-shop, we are adding it.

history.title: Change History
history.description: Track all changes to an item – from price adjustments to status changes. We opt for the maximum amount of transparency.

watchlist.title: Personal Watchlist
watchlist.description: Save interesting items and keep track of their development. Get notified when price or availability changes.

translations.title: Automatic Translations
translations.description: Search and discover all items in your preferred language, without any barriers. We currently support English, German, French and Spanish.

personalFilter.description: Save your search request and get notified about new offers or updated items. The antiques you used to search for, now come to you.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here you'll find answers to the most important questions about Aura Historia.

howItWorks.question: How does Aura Historia work?
howItWorks.answer: Aura Historia continuously searches the websites of over 500 antique dealers, auction houses and marketplaces worldwide and collects all offers in one central place. Our intelligent search allows you to find exactly what you're looking for.

directPurchase.question: Can I buy items directly through Aura Historia?
directPurchase.answer: No, Aura Historia is a pure search platform. If you want to buy an item, you will be redirected directly to the respective dealer's website where you can complete the purchase.

priceAlerts.question: How do price and availability notifications work?
priceAlerts.answer: Once you add an item to your watchlist, we automatically track its price- and availability development for you. As soon as something changes with your item, you receive a notification via E-Mail.

updateFrequency.question: How often is the data updated?
updateFrequency.answer: Our data is continuously updated. We operate in near real-time.

dealers.question: Which Antique Online-Shops are on Aura Historia?
dealers.answer: We include data from over 500 renowned antique dealers from more than 15 countries. Among them you'll find both, large auction houses and specialized dealers for all antique areas.

dealerRequest.question: I know an online dealer/auction house/marketplace that's not yet on Aura Historia. Can we add it?
dealerRequest.answer: Yes! Send us an email to contact@aura-historia.com and include the URL/Link of the shop along any additional information you might want to provide. We will verify the shop and include it within hours.

comparisonBarnebys.question: How does Aura Historia compare to Barnebys?
comparisonBarnebys.answer: While Barnebys is also an antiques search engine, they only focus on the largest players - the big auction houses and dealers. This makes up for a very high chance for you to miss out on what you're actually searching for. Ask yourself, where did I find my biggest treasures? It probably was a small local dealer or even thrift store.

comparisonPriceDatabase.question: How does Aura Historia compare to price databases like WorthPoint and the salesroom?
comparisonPriceDatabase.answer: Price databases leverage the sheer amount of historical data with auction results dating back to the 90s. While this helps finding comparisons for astronomically rare pieces, it often deflects the current market-value and availability of antiques. If your goal is to find antiques or research their current value, Aura Historia is the right place. We also want to take a heavy standpoint against the monetization of historical antique pricing data. You should not need to pay to find out what sold at which price.
